oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: The New Digital Bleek and Lloyd Archive
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: !nanni (XI)
Tamme (XII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A description of the making of 'wells' (or !ha) in !nanni and Tamme's country. They say that the water has 'one root', which refers to the well in Mowbray. 1) This story is found in Book XI & XII-10.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd !kun notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Water and wells
